.tool_number_lines_area,.exam_skin_wood .tooldiolag_student .toolNumberLines .tool_number_lines_area{left:0;right:0}.exam_skin_wood .com_tooldialog_board .toolNumberLines .tool_number_lines_area,.exam_skin_wood .com_tooldiolag_board .toolNumberLines .tool_number_lines_area{left:4em;right:4em}.exam_skin_wood .simulationClock{position:relative;width:100%;height:100%;background:#bfd3e2;text-align:center;overflow:hidden}.exam_skin_wood .simulationClock .clock_main_box{position:absolute;top:2.66667em;left:0;right:0;bottom:11.5em;text-align:center}.exam_skin_wood .simulationClock .clock_main_box:after{content:"";display:inline-block;width:0;height:100%;vertical-align:middle}.exam_skin_wood .simulationClock .mainclock{display:inline-block;position:relative;width:30.33333em;height:30.33333em;vertical-align:middle;background:url(resources/wood/images/mainclock_bg.png) no-repeat 50%;background-size:100% auto}.exam_skin_wood .simulationClock .clock_num{position:absolute;left:-.16667em;top:.66667em;width:30.16667em;height:29em;background:url(resources/wood/images/mainclock_outnum.png) no-repeat 50%;background-size:100% auto;text-indent:-9999px}.exam_skin_wood .simulationClock .second_hand{z-index:12;margin-top:-9em;height:10.95833em;background:url(resources/wood/images/second_hand.png) no-repeat top;background-size:.54167em 10.95833em;-webkit-transform-origin:center 9.04167em;transform-origin:center 9.04167em}.exam_skin_wood .simulationClock .minute_hand,.exam_skin_wood .simulationClock .second_hand{display:inline-block;position:absolute;left:50%;top:50%;margin-left:-.875em;width:1.75em;text-indent:-9999px}.exam_skin_wood .simulationClock .minute_hand{z-index:11;margin-top:-6.625em;height:7.91667em;background:url(resources/wood/images/minute_hand.png) no-repeat top;background-size:1.25em 8em;-webkit-transform-origin:center 6.625em;transform-origin:center 6.625em}.exam_skin_wood .simulationClock .hour_hand{z-index:10;display:inline-block;position:absolute;left:50%;top:50%;margin-left:-.875em;margin-top:-5.66667em;width:1.75em;height:6.875em;background:url(resources/wood/images/hour_hand.png) no-repeat top;background-size:1.5em 6.83333em;text-indent:-9999px;-webkit-transform-origin:center 5.66667em;transform-origin:center 5.66667em}.exam_skin_wood .simulationClock .clock_circle{z-index:13;margin-left:-1.04167em;background:url(resources/wood/images/clock_center_circle.png) no-repeat 50%;background-size:.83333em .83333em}.exam_skin_wood .simulationClock .clock_circle,.exam_skin_wood .simulationClock .clock_gear{display:inline-block;position:absolute;left:50%;top:50%;margin-top:-1.5625em;width:2.08333em;height:3.125em;text-indent:-9999px}.exam_skin_wood .simulationClock .clock_gear{z-index:14;margin-left:-1em;background:url(resources/wood/images/icon_gear.png) no-repeat 50%;background-size:2.08333em 3.125em}.exam_skin_wood .simulationClock .btn_linkage{position:absolute;right:1em;top:27.83333em;display:inline-block;background:#f9f9f9;border-radius:2.33333em}.exam_skin_wood .simulationClock .btn_linkage:after{content:"";display:block;position:absolute;left:0;top:0;right:0;bottom:0;border:.08333em solid #9cb0bf;border-radius:2.33333em}.exam_skin_wood .simulationClock .btn_linkage.on{background-image:-webkit-radial-gradient(#f69b2e 0,#f69b2e 65%,#e88b1b 100%);background-image:radial-gradient(#f69b2e 0,#f69b2e 65%,#e88b1b 100%)}.exam_skin_wood .simulationClock .btn_linkage.on:after{border-color:#d78828}.exam_skin_wood .simulationClock .btn_linkage.on .linkage_on{display:inline-block}.exam_skin_wood .simulationClock .btn_linkage.on .linkage_off{display:none}.exam_skin_wood .simulationClock .linkage_on{display:none;float:left}.exam_skin_wood .simulationClock .linkage_on .btn_linkage_on_text{display:inline-block;float:left;min-width:4.66667em;max-width:9.16667em;height:2.29167em;padding:0 .33333em 0 .5em;line-height:2.16667em;color:#593000;text-align:right;overflow:hidden}.exam_skin_wood .simulationClock .linkage_on .btn_linkage_on_text_em{font-size:.83333em}.exam_skin_wood .simulationClock .linkage_on .linkage_on_circle{display:inline-block;float:left;margin:.04167em 0 0;width:2.20833em;height:2.20833em;background:#fff;border:1px solid #eb9736;border-radius:50%}.exam_skin_wood .simulationClock .linkage_off{display:inline-block;float:left}.exam_skin_wood .simulationClock .linkage_off .btn_linkage_on_text{display:inline-block;float:left;min-width:4.66667em;max-width:9.16667em;height:2.29167em;padding:0 .41667em 0 .08333em;line-height:2.16667em;color:#000;text-align:left;overflow:hidden}.exam_skin_wood .simulationClock .linkage_off .btn_linkage_on_text_em{font-size:.83333em}.exam_skin_wood .simulationClock .linkage_off .linkage_on_circle{display:inline-block;float:left;margin:.04167em 0 0;width:2.20833em;height:2.20833em;background:#fff;border-radius:50%;border:1px solid #9cb0bf}.exam_skin_wood .simulationClock .clock_choose_box{position:absolute;height:10em;bottom:.75em;width:100%;text-align:center}.exam_skin_wood .simulationClock .clock_choose{display:inline-block;height:10em;background:rgba(242,246,249,.68);border-radius:10em;padding:0 1.95833em 0 .83333em}.exam_skin_wood .simulationClock .clock_choose_line{float:left;display:inline-block;width:0;height:6.41667em;margin:1.91667em .16667em 0 .29167em;border-left:1px solid rgba(179,196,209,.51);border-right:1px solid rgba(253,254,254,.24)}.exam_skin_wood .simulationClock .list_clock_choose{float:left;display:inline-block;width:7.33333em;height:10em}.exam_skin_wood .simulationClock .list_clock_choose.nosecond_hand{background:url(resources/wood/images/icon_clock01_off.png) no-repeat 50%;background-size:100% auto}.exam_skin_wood .simulationClock .list_clock_choose.nosecond_hand.on{background:url(resources/wood/images/icon_clock01_on.png) no-repeat 50%;background-size:100% auto}.exam_skin_wood .simulationClock .list_clock_choose.havesecond_hand{margin-left:-.66667em;background:url(resources/wood/images/icon_clock02_off.png) no-repeat 50%;background-size:100% auto}.exam_skin_wood .simulationClock .list_clock_choose.havesecond_hand.on{background:url(resources/wood/images/icon_clock02_on.png) no-repeat 50%;background-size:100% auto}.exam_skin_wood .simulationClock .list_clock_choose.noclock_num{background:url(resources/wood/images/icon_clock03_off.png) no-repeat 50%;background-size:100% auto}.exam_skin_wood .simulationClock .list_clock_choose.noclock_num.on{background:url(resources/wood/images/icon_clock03_on.png) no-repeat 50%;background-size:100% auto}.exam_skin_wood .simulationClock .list_clock_choose.haveclock_num{margin-left:.20833em;background:url(resources/wood/images/icon_clock04_off.png) no-repeat 50%;background-size:100% auto}.exam_skin_wood .simulationClock .list_clock_choose.haveclock_num.on{background:url(resources/wood/images/icon_clock04_on.png) no-repeat 50%;background-size:100% auto}.com_tooldiolag .tooldiolag_title.title_simulationClock:before{width:1.5em;height:1.5em;margin-top:-.33333em;margin-right:.41667em;background:url(resources/wood/images/icon_simulationClock.png) no-repeat;background-size:contain}.typefaces_long .exam_skin_wood .simulationClock .btn_linkage{right:auto;left:50%;margin-left:6em;white-space:nowrap}.typefaces_long .exam_skin_wood .simulationClock .linkage_on .btn_linkage_on_text{float:none;vertical-align:top;max-width:none}.typefaces_long .exam_skin_wood .simulationClock .linkage_on .linkage_on_circle{float:none;vertical-align:top}.typefaces_long .exam_skin_wood .simulationClock .linkage_off .btn_linkage_on_text{float:none;vertical-align:top;max-width:none}.typefaces_long .exam_skin_wood .simulationClock .linkage_off .linkage_on_circle{float:none;vertical-align:top}.typefaces_ru_RU .exam_skin_wood .simulationClock .btn_linkage{right:auto;left:50%;margin-left:6em;white-space:nowrap}.typefaces_ru_RU .exam_skin_wood .simulationClock .linkage_on .exam_skin_wood .simulationClock .linkage_off .btn_linkage_on_text{float:none;vertical-align:top;max-width:none}.typefaces_ru_RU .exam_skin_wood .simulationClock .linkage_off .linkage_on_circle{float:none;vertical-align:top}
addon.view: 指针联动 指针不联动
